definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: But they disagree over the source of their disagreement.
sentences.chinese: 然两国争执的源由是双方的严重利益分歧所在。

sentences.english: At the next meeting, there was a9)split in the club membership.
sentences.chinese: 在接下来的会议里，俱乐部成员之间出现了意见分歧。

sentences.english: C. back one year, put the year zero in the gap, and declare the disagreement solved.
sentences.chinese: 支持一年，投入年调零空白，并且宣称解决的分歧。

sentences.english: But there were signs of disagreement among the allies in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 但是有迹象表明在巴黎时盟军中存在分歧。

sentences.english: But theorists hold different viewpoints on the origin of historical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 但学术界在唯物史观诞生标志问题上，一直都有分歧。

sentences.english: One way to resolve this apparent contradiction is to notice who the comparisons are between.
sentences.chinese: 一条解决这个明显的分歧的途径是注意谁是比较方。

sentences.english: I hope finwhichley we be to stay away we difference or get hand by oneself.
sentences.chinese: 我希望最终咱们能化解彼此之间的分歧然后重新合好。

sentences.english: We should seek common ground and properly handle differences.
sentences.chinese: 我们要求同存异，妥善处理分歧。

sentences.english: If explanation meets any diverges, the english version shall prevail.
sentences.chinese: 如果解释上遇分歧，应以英文本为准。

sentences.english: But honey is not the stickiest issue dividing the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 但是蜂蜜并非导致两国产生分歧的最大问题。

sentences.english: Being summed up, there are creditor's right theory, mixed-right theory and new-right theory in this field.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这一重大问题在理论界却存在诸多分歧。
必须欢迎有分歧的想法。

sentences.english: We believe that it is up to the people on both sides of the Strait to resolve their differences peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为要由海峡两岸人民和平解决他们的分歧。

sentences.english: There are disputations about donator's right of revocation theoretically.
sentences.chinese: 理论上对赠与人撤销权制度的认识存在着极大的分歧。

sentences.english: The disagreement left deep wounds that only time may heal.
sentences.chinese: 意见分歧已留下深深的伤痕，只有时间来医治创伤了。

sentences.english: Yes, there have been differences between America and Europe.
sentences.chinese: 不可否认，欧美之间已存在分歧。
